1234567891011def get_contents(image_shape, ctx): # è¿”å›æ ‡å‡†åŒ–çš„å†…å®¹å›¾åƒå’Œå†…å®¹å›¾ç‰‡çš„å†…å®¹ç‰¹å¾ content_img_norm = preprocess(content_img, image_shape).copyto(ctx) content_img_contents, _ = extract_features(content_X, content_layers, style_layers) return content_img_norm, content_img_contentsdef get_styles(image_shape, ctx): # Y).square().mean() æ ·å¼æŸå¤±ä¸­éœ€è¦æ ¼æ‹‰å§†çŸ©é˜µè¿ç®—ï¼Œå…ˆå®šä¹‰æ ¼æ‹‰å§†å‡½æ•°ï¼Œstyle_lossä¹Ÿæ˜¯é€šè¿‡å¹³æ–¹è¯¯å·®å‡½æ•°è¡¡é‡ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ¼æ‹‰å§†çŸ©é˜µä¹‹é—´çš„å·®å¼‚ã€‚ 1234567891011# æ ¼æ‹‰å§†çŸ©é˜µ# Xæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªï¼ˆbatch,channel,h,wï¼‰# næ˜¯è®¡ç®—å¾—åˆ°çš„batch*h*w# å†æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µé‡å¡‘å½¢çŠ¶ä¸º(channels, n)def gram(X): num_channels, n = X.shape[1], X.size // X.shape[1] X = X.reshape((num_channels, n)) return nd.dot(X, X.T) / (num_channels * n)def style_loss(Y_hat, gram_Y): return (gram(Y_hat) - gram_Y).square().mean() æ€»å˜å·®æŸå¤±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé™å™ªç®—æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒä½¿å¾—å›¾åƒä¸­çš„åƒç´ å°½å¯èƒ½å’Œé‚»è¿‘çš„åƒç´ å€¼ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œè¾“å…¥å€¼ä¸ºåˆæˆå›¾åƒçš„è¾“å‡ºã€‚ 123def tv_loss(Y_hat): return 0.5 * ((Y_hat[:, :, 1:, :] - Y_hat[:, :, :-1, :]).abs().mean() + (Y_hat[:, :, :, 1:] - Y_hat[:, :, :, :-1]).abs().mean()) æŸå¤±å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å„ç±»æŸå¤±å’Œæ€»çš„æŸå¤± 12345678910111213141516171819style_channels = [net[l].weight.shape[0] for l in style_layers] # netæŸå±‚çš„é€šé“æ•°# è°ƒèŠ‚è¿™ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥æƒè¡¡åˆæˆå›¾åƒåœ¨ä¿ç•™å†…å®¹ã€è¿ç§»æ ·å¼ä»¥åŠé™å™ªã€‚# content_weight, style_weight = 10, 10 çš„è¯å°±åŸºæœ¬å’ŒåŸå›¾æ— åŒºåˆ«# å°†content_weightè°ƒå°ï¼Œstyle_weightè°ƒå¤§ï¼Œç”»é¢æ‰å¾ˆé£æ ¼åŒ–content_weight = 1style_weights = [1e5//n for n in style_channels] # å°½é‡æå–åˆ°ç»†èŠ‚çš„æ ·å¼è€Œå¼±åŒ–å…¨å±€æ ·å¼tv_weight = 10def compute_loss(X, contents_Y_hat, styles_Y_hat, content_img_contents, styles_gram): # åˆ†åˆ«è®¡ç®—å†…å®¹æŸå¤±ã€æ ·å¼æŸå¤±å’Œæ€»å˜å·®æŸå¤± contents_l = [content_loss(Y_hat, Y) * content_weight for Y_hat, Y in zip( contents_Y_hat, content_img_contents)] styles_l = [style_loss(Y_hat, Y) * style_weight for style_weight, Y_hat, Y in zip( style_weights, styles_Y_hat, styles_Y_gram)] tv_l = tv_loss(X) * tv_weight # å¯¹æ‰€æœ‰æŸå¤±æ±‚å’Œ l = nd.add_n(*styles_l) + nd.add_n(*contents_l) + tv_l return contents_l, styles_l, tv_l, l åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆæˆå›¾åƒï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯å”¯ä¸€éœ€è¦è®­ç»ƒçš„æ¨¡å‹ã€‚å‰å‘è®¡ç®—å°±æ˜¯è¿”å›å…¶æƒé‡å‚æ•°ï¼Œå³åˆæˆçš„å›¾ç‰‡ã€‚123456789101112131415class GeneratedImage(nn.Block): def __init__(self, img_shape, **kwargs): super(GeneratedImage, self).__init__(**kwargs) self.weight = self.params.get('weight', shape=img_shape) def forward(self): return self.weight.data()def get_inits(X, ctx, lr, styles): gen_img = GeneratedImage(X.shape) gen_img.initialize(init.Constant(X), ctx=ctx, force_reinit=True) trainer = gluon.Trainer(gen_img.collect_params(), 'adam', {'learning_rate': lr}) styles_gram = [gram(Y) for Y in styles] return gen_img(), styles_gram, trainer è®­ç»ƒ1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435def train(content_img_norm, content_img_contents, stystyle_img_styles, lr, max_epochs, lr_decay_epoch): ''' å‚æ•°: content_img_norm:æ ‡å‡†åŒ–çš„å†…å®¹å›¾åƒï¼Œç”¨ä½œåˆå§‹åŒ–åˆæˆå›¾åƒï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥åŠ é€Ÿè®­ç»ƒ content_img_contents:å†…å®¹å›¾åƒçš„å†…å®¹ stystyle_img_styles:æ ·å¼å›¾åƒçš„æ ·å¼ lr:å­¦ä¹ ç‡ max_epochs:æœ€å¤§è¿­ä»£å‘¨æœŸ lr_decay_epoch:å­¦ä¹ ç‡è¡°å‡å‘¨æœŸ è¿”å›ï¼š Xï¼šåˆæˆå›¾åƒçš„è¾“å‡ºï¼ˆå³ä¸€ä¸ªå‰å‘è®¡ç®—ï¼‰ ''' ctx = d2l.try_gpu() X, styles_gram, trainer = get_inits(content_img_norm, ctx, lr, stystyle_img_styles) for i in range(max_epochs): start = time.time() with autograd.record(): contents_Y_hat, styles_Y_hat = extract_features( X, content_layers, style_layers) contents_l, styles_l, tv_l, l = compute_loss( X, contents_Y_hat, styles_Y_hat, content_img_contents, styles_gram) l.backward() trainer.step(1) nd.waitall() # @æœ‰ç©ºè§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹ if i % 50 == 0 and i != 0: print('epoch %3d, content loss %.2f, style loss %.2f, ' 'TV loss %.2f, %.2f sec' % (i, nd.add_n(*contents_l).asscalar(), # @æœ‰ç©ºè§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹ nd.add_n(*styles_l).asscalar(), tv_l.asscalar(), time.time() - start)) # è¿™é‡Œçš„æ—¶é—´åªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‘¨æœŸçš„ if i % lr_decay_epoch == 0 and i != 0: # å‡å°‘å­¦ä¹ ç‡ trainer.set_learning_rate(trainer.learning_rate * 0.1) print('change lr to %.1e' % trainer.learning_rate) return X è®¾ç½®éœ€è¦çš„åˆæˆå›¾ç‰‡å¤§å°ï¼Œçˆ†æ˜¾å­˜å°±è°ƒå°ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚æ­¤å¤§å°2GBæ˜¾å­˜å¤Ÿç”¨ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å¥½å¹¶å¼€å§‹è®­ç»ƒã€‚ 1234567image_shape = (400, 300)net.collect_params().reset_ctx(ctx)content_img_norm, content_img_contents = get_contents(image_shape, ctx)_, style_img_styles = get_styles(image_shape, ctx)# å†…å®¹å›¾ç‰‡_norm,å†…å®¹å›¾ç‰‡_normçš„å†…å®¹,æ ·å¼å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ ·å¼output = train(content_img_norm, content_img_contents, stystyle_img_styles, 0.01, 500, 200) ä¿å­˜å›¾åƒ 1d2l.plt.imsave('../img/neural-style-1.png', postprocess(output).asnumpy()) å…¶å®çœ‹æ•ˆæœè¿˜æ˜¯å¯ä»¥ã€‚æƒ³è®©åˆæˆå›¾åƒæ›´åŠ æ¥è¿‘æ ·å¼å›¾åƒï¼Œå¯ä»¥è°ƒå¤§ä¸€äº›æ ·å¼çš„æƒé‡ï¼Œä½†æ³¨æ„å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰æ ·å¼å±‚éƒ½æœ‰å¾ˆå¤§çš„æƒé‡é‚£ä¹ˆå¯èƒ½ä¼šå­¦ä¹ åˆ°æ›´å¤šçš„å…¨å±€æ ·å¼ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚ä¸åŒå‚æ•°ä¸‹çš„æ•ˆæœä¹Ÿä¸åŒï¼Œæ€»ä¹‹è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ˆæœ‰è¶£çš„æ¨¡å‹ã€‚

posts.title: æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ è¯†åˆ«æ–¹åœ†(2)
posts.text: æ­å»ºæ¨¡å‹-CNNæœ¬æ¬¡å…ˆç”¨CNNæ¥æ­å»ºç¥ç»ç½‘ç»œï¼Œå®ç°å›¾åƒçš„è¯†åˆ« å‚æ•°ã€è¶…å‚æ•°12batch_size = 50 # ä¸€æ‰¹å–50ä¸ªæ•°æ®lr = 0.5 # learning rate åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å‹12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637import tensorflow as tf# åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å‹tf_input = tf.placeholder(tf.float32,[None,1602])tf_x = tf_input[:,:1600]x_img = tf.reshape(tf_x,[-1,40,40,1])tf_y = tf_input[:,1600:] # onehot## CNNconv1 = tf.layers.conv2d( # shape:(40,40,1) inputs = x_img, filters = 10, # å›¾åƒå·ç§¯åçš„æ·±åº¦ kernel_size = 5, # æ‰«ææ ¸5*5å¤§å° padding = 'same', activity_regularizer = tf.nn.relu) # shape:(40,40,10)pool1 = tf.layers.max_pooling2d( inputs = conv1, pool_size = [2,2], strides = 2) # shape:(20,20,10)conv2 = tf.layers.conv2d( inputs = pool1, filters = 20, kernel_size = 5, padding = 'same', activity_regularizer = tf.nn.relu) # shape:(20,20,20)pool2 = tf.layers.max_pooling2d( inputs = conv2, pool_size = [2,2], strides = 2) # shape:(10,10,20)shape = pool2.get_shape().as_list() # (à¸‡ â€¢_â€¢)à¸‡flat_data = tf.reshape(pool2,[-1,shape[1]*shape[2]*shape[3]])output = tf.layers.dense(flat_data,2) #ç”¨äºå…¨è¿æ¥å±‚ï¼ŒäºŒåˆ†ç±»0æˆ–è€…1ã€‚ å®šä¹‰æŸå¤±å‡½æ•°æ­¤å¤„æˆ‘ä»¬é€‰æ‹©çš„æ˜¯äº¤å‰ç†µæŸå¤±å‡½æ•°ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œçš„tf_yone_hotå½¢å¼çš„ï¼Œæ¥è‡ªæ•°æ®é›†çš„yï¼Œoutputå°±æ˜¯æ¨¡å‹çš„é¢„æµ‹å€¼1234loss = tf.losses.softmax_cross_entropy( onehot_labels = tf_y, logits = output) é€‰æ‹©ä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹æ³•è®­ç»ƒæ­¤å¤„æˆ‘ä»¬é€‰æ‹©çš„æ˜¯AdamOptimizerï¼Œå½“ç„¶ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å°è¯•å…¶ä»–ä¼˜åŒ–å™¨ã€‚1train_op = tf.train.AdamOptimizer(lr).minimize(loss) è®¡ç®—æ¨¡å‹ç²¾åº¦12345# ç”¨äºæµ‹è¯•è¯¥æ¨¡å‹çš„è¯†åˆ«ç²¾ç¡®åº¦accuracy = tf.metrics.accuracy( labels = tf.argmax(tf_y,axis = 1), predictions = tf.argmax(output,axis = 1))[1]

posts.title: æœºå™¨å­¦ä¹ è¯†åˆ«æ–¹åœ†(4)
posts.text: RNNç…§æ ·è¯†åˆ«ä½ æ˜¯æ–¹æ˜¯åœ† ç®€ä»‹å‰é¢ç”¨CNNå®è·µäº†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå…¶å®ç”¨RNNä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥è¯†åˆ«å›¾åƒçš„ã€‚åªæ˜¯è¯´å­˜åœ¨è¿™åœ¨äºæ›´åŠ å¤§å‹çš„æ¨¡å‹é‡Œçš„å¥½åé—®é¢˜ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ä¸ªå°æ•°æ®é›†ä¸Šï¼ŒRNNåŒæ ·ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åšåˆ†ç±»å¤„ç†çš„ï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿™æ ·ä¹Ÿèƒ½åŠ æ·±ç†è§£ã€‚ç”¨ä¸‹å›¾è§£é‡Šä¸€ä¸‹RNNå¤„ç†å›¾åƒæ—¶çš„è¾“å…¥éš¾ç‚¹è¿˜æ˜¯åœ¨å¤„ç†æ•°æ®ï¼Œè°ƒæ•´æ¨¡å‹ä½¿ä¹‹ä¸æ•°æ®ç»´åº¦åŒ¹é… ä»£ç 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081import pandas as pdimport numpy as npimport tensorflow as tf# è¶…å‚æ•°batch_size = 50time_step = 40input_size = 40lr = 0.005hidden_unit = 256def to_onehot(y): for i in range(len(y)): if y.iloc[i,1600]==0: y.iloc[i,1600] = 'y' else: y.iloc[i,1600] = 'f' return pd.get_dummies(y)# å‡†å¤‡æ•°æ®data_set = pd.read_csv('train.csv').iloc[:,1:]# ä»…æŠŠæ ‡ç­¾è½¬åŒ–æˆonehotdata_set = to_onehot(data_set)# æ‰“ä¹±æ•°æ®ï¼Œä½¿æ•°æ®éšæœºdata_set = data_set.values.astype(np.float32)np.random.shuffle(data_set)# åˆ’åˆ†è®­ç»ƒé›†å’ŒéªŒè¯é›†sep = int(0.7*len(data_set))train_data = data_set[:sep]test_data = data_set[sep:]# åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡å‹tf_input = tf.placeholder(tf.float32,[None,1602])tf_x = tf_input[:,:1600]x_img = tf.reshape(tf_x,[-1,time_step,input_size])tf_y = tf_input[:,1600:] # onehot## RNNrnn_cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(num_units = hidden_unit)output_ , states = tf.nn.dynamic_rnn( rnn_cell, #cell x_img, #input initial_state = None, #åˆå§‹åŒ–éšè—å±‚çš„çŠ¶æ€,è¡¨ç¤ºä¸åˆå§‹åŒ– dtype = tf.float32, #å’Œä¸Šé¢é‚£å¥å¿…é¡»åŒæ—¶å‡ºç° time_major = False #False: (batch, time_step, input); True: (time_step, batch, input))output = tf.layers.dense(output_[:,-1,:],2) #å¯¹è¾“å‡ºè¿›è¡Œæœ€åçš„ä¿®æ”¹loss = tf.losses.softmax_cross_entropy(onehot_labels = tf_y,logits = output)train_op = tf.train.AdamOptimizer(lr).minimize(loss)# è®¡ç®—ç²¾åº¦accuracy = tf.metrics.accuracy( labels = tf.argmax(tf_y,axis = 1), predictions = tf.argmax(output,axis = 1))[1]# é‡è¦æ­¥éª¤ï¼ï¼åˆå§‹åŒ–sess = tf.Session()#åˆå§‹åŒ–å…¨å±€å’Œæœ¬åœ°å˜é‡init_op = tf.group(tf.global_variables_initializer(), tf.local_variables_initializer())sess.run(init_op)# è®­ç»ƒprint("RNNæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œlearning rateï¼š",lr)for step in range(1201): batch_index = np.random.randint(len(train_data), size = batch_size) sess.run(train_op,{tf_input:train_data[batch_index]}) if step % 50 ==0: acc_, loss_ = sess.run([accuracy, loss], {tf_input: test_data}) print("Step: %i" % step, "| Accurate: %.8f" % acc_, "| Loss: %.2f" % loss_ ) if step == 1200: predictions_2 = tf.argmax(output,axis = 1) test_data_ = test_data[:50] acc_,predictions_2_ ,output_= sess.run([accuracy,predictions_2,output], feed_dict = {tf_input: test_data_}) print('predictions_2:', predictions_2_,'output:',output_) print('accuracy:',acc_)

} // class methods String::String(const char * s) // construct String from C string { len = std::strlen(s); // set size str = new char[len + 1]; // allot storage std::strncpy(str, s, len + 1); // initialize pointer num_strings++; // set object count } String::String() // default constructor { len = 4; str = new char[1]; str[0] = '\0'; // default string num_strings++; } String::String(const String & st) { num_strings++; // handle static member update len = st.len; // same length str = new char[len + 1]; // allot space std::strcpy(str, st.str); // copy string to new location } String::~String() // necessary destructor { --num_strings; // required delete[] str; // required } // overloaded operator methods // assign a String to a String String & String::operator=(const String & st) { if (this == &st) return *this; delete[] str; len = st.len; str = new char[len + 1]; std::strncpy(str, st.str, len + 1); return *this; } // assign a C string to a String String & String::operator=(const char * s) { delete[] str; len = std::strlen(s); str = new char[len + 1]; std::strcpy(str, s); return *this; } String String::operator+(const String &s) { String sum; sum.len = len + s.len; sum.str = new char[sum.len + 1]; std::strcpy(sum.str, str); std::strcat(sum.str, s.str); return sum; } // read-write char access for non-const String char & String::operator[](int i) { return str[i]; } // read-only char access for const String const char & String::operator[](int i) const { return str[i]; } // overloaded operator friends bool operator
